TACAN/ILS Navigation.action: ICP SEQ to change TCN to TCN T/R
ICP enter TACAN code, dobber down for X/Y

TACAN/ILS Navigation.text: TACAN heading appear on the outside of your compass when you change mode to compass TCN mode

Steerpoint Navigation.action: ICP up down to select Steerpoint nr
ICP dobber down and enter LAT/LON/ALT

Steerpoint Navigation.text: Use ICP up/down to change steerpoint. Heading will appear in your HUD and on the outside of your compass when compass mode is in NAV mode

Overfly Markpoints.action: Fly over intended markpoint and press short TMS up

Overfly Markpoints.text: You can make markpoints your selected steerpoint with ICP M_SEL (0)

HUD Markpoints.action: slew with rdr cursor short TMS up twice to create markpoint

HUD Markpoints.text: You can make markpoints your selected steerpoint with ICP M_SEL (0)

HMD Markpoints.action: slew with rdr cursor long TMS up to cue HMD selection option
short TMS up twice to create markpoint

HMD Markpoints.text: You can make markpoints your selected steerpoint with ICP M_SEL (0)

Armament A-A.text: right mfd will change to sms page
You can also change to A-A by selecting the AA override dog fight button
Optional release extra fuel bags for manoeuvrability by selecting S-J on right MDF and the tank you wish to release (OSB 3/7/19) and press release weapons. Press S-J again to return to previous menu.

Armament A-A.action: use OSB 7 on to change missile type
use osb 19 to change modes (slew, bore)

Armament A-A.requirement: Maintain situation awareness by moving right mfd to HSD

Armament A-A.action: change range with osb 19 or 20 as required
ensure you are on FCR page
change range with osb 19 or 20 as required

Armament A-A.requirement: On left mdf find target on radar

Armament A-A.action: short TMS fwd, target will become boxed on HUD

Armament A-A.text: For AIM9 you will need to uncage (c) and you will hear a long beep as a diamond box will appear inside locked target
Missile range shown on right side of hud left of current altitude with total range (open bracket) and certain shot (closed bracket)
Left of it you will find the Locked Target closure speed in kts (higher means they are moving towards you, slower moving away)
For AIM120 put the target designation box inside the allowable steering error code which will grow as you approach target shooting range

Optional: AIM120 have MADDOG mode where missiles shot will find first available target (friendly or not). To select it in right mfd select sms page followed by changing it to bore using obs 19. You will need to find the target visually and place it inside the allowable steering error code < 10nm. MADDOG does NOT require and active radar

Armament A-A.action: press release weapons - FOX2 (press and hold for 120 - FOX3)

Armament A-G HARM.text: Requires HARM targeting pod on 5L pylon

Armament A-G HARM.action: use OSB 6 on to change missile type to AG65

Armament A-G HARM.requirement: Maintain situation awareness by moving right mfd to HSD

Armament A-G HARM.text: You will need to know asset RWR reference code to narrow down search time

Armament A-G HARM.requirement: On left mfd once you find reference(s)
On left mfd unselect undesirable references
On left mfd return to HAS page
On left mfd once target found

Armament A-G HARM.action: select target with short TMS fwd, target will become boxed on MFD
HUD HARM box will start flashing, hold release weapons - RIFLE

Armament A-G TGC.text: Recommended LITENING targeting pod on 5R pylon

Armament A-G TGC.action: use OSB 6 on to change missile type to AC88
change to WPN page (warm up is required)
select blank spot (eg:OBS 12) and change to TGP page (warm up is required)

Armament A-G TGC.text: You should be able to change between WPN and TGP by using DMS right short

Armament A-G TGC.action: Press RTN and select desired Steerpoint
left mfd to FCR or HSD page as required

Armament A-G TGC.text: If TGP in right MFD says STBY on OSB 1, press OSB 1 then A-G on OSB 6 to turn camera on
You can cross cue targets from TGP to WPN by marking them. slew with rdr cursor and select with with short TMS fwd. on WPN page the new target should be selected
Missile targeting range is displayed only in WPN bottom right page shown as a carrot with distance in nautical miles

Armament A-G TGC.action: change to WPN with DMS right short

Armament A-G TGC.text: TGP will maintain lock on targeted point, you can swap to it using short DMS down
TGP can acquire targets via (OBS 2) MAN (slew with rdr cursor), AUTO (Steerpoint selected)
TGP can also acquire Mark points via ICP with SOI TGP: ICP RTN followed by Mark (7), short TMS up to create markpoint, RTN, TMS down
TGP can also acquire Mark points via ICP with SOI HUD: ICP RTN followed by Mark (7), slew with rdr cursor short TMS up twice to create markpoint, RTN, TMS down

Armament A-G CCIP.action: use OSB 6 on to change missile type
Approach from side, dive left/right towards target, roll level at -30 degrees maintaining pip on target
hold release weapons, slowly pull back on stick to pull out
